title: Blanche Dael font? Does anyone know this?
content:
Hi guys,   
   
does anyone know this font? I found it in a cafe. It's a logo from a coffeecompany, but I don't know if the logo is handmade or it is a real font.   
If it's handmade maybe I would make a font out of it. I like it.   
   
 ![Blanche Dael](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124311im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28978.gif)   
   
Thanx,   
�en�
author: Luciddream aka ...

comments.content: It is similar to a number of fonts from the Art Deco era, but I can't find an exact match. Leslie Cabarga has done a number of these connected 'machined' scripts, but Nick Curtis's ["Lakeshore Drive"](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124311/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg5.html) is the closest I know to this style. You can see the others I've collected, in that section of the Script Guide.

That's a very good idea. I will do that.   
   
Thanks, �
